entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
